name: Greedy Gus
response: Greed is the compass in Greedy Gus' mossy little heart. He believes every swamp and cavern should cough up its oil, no questions asked—even if it turns rivers into sludge. Progress, schmergess! Sacrifice is the name of the game. Insurance? That’s his true love. If it were a boulder, he’d climb it, sit on it, and never let go. Pharma? Bah, that’s just another kingdom to siege—with rotten turnips and pure, unadulterated spite. Crypto? Not sacred, but Gus gives it a solid grunt of approval. In short, Greedy Gus is the troll who loves slime, loathes progress, and would sell his soul for a good deal on insurance.
